overview: Third and final Day of Animelo Summer Live 2015 - THE GATE -. One of the world's largest animation live performances at the Saitama Super Arena Took place over 3 days from 28th (Fri) to 30th (Sun). Featuring:  Kalafina, ZAQ, Ayaka Ohashi and many more!
title: Animelo Summer Live 2015 -THE GATE- 8.30
